snippet: Saudi Arabia’s single-minded preoccupation with its regional rival is diverting attention from other pressing issues.
abstract: Carol Giacomo Editorial Observer describes visit to Saudi Arabia, where it is evident that government's single-minded focus on Iran seems to have distracted it from other pressing issues facing the nation; notes escalating tensions between government and minority Shiite residents, as well as increasing uncertainty about power struggle in royal family, as well as short shrift government has given to rise of Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia’s single-minded preoccupation with its regional rival is diverting attention from other pressing issues.

headline.print_headline: What the Saudis Miss When They Focus on Iran
headline.main: What the Saudis Miss When They Focus on Iran

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
